solution_line_template: The vet made {num_dogs_adopted} * {dog_vet_fee} = ${num_dogs_adopted}*{dog_vet_fee}={dog_fees}>>{dog_fees} in dog vet fees.
The vet made {num_cats_adopted} * {cat_vet_fee} = ${num_cats_adopted}*{cat_vet_fee}={cat_fees}>>{cat_fees} in cat vet fees.
The vet donated 1/3 of the fees, so they donated {total_vet_fees} / {donation_divisor} = ${total_vet_fees}/{donation_divisor}={vet_donation}>>{vet_donation} back to the shelter.
